mapper.select: SELECT id FROM qyfinance.bkvwCustomer WHERE companyId = #{param} AND typeId = 1
SELECT DISTINCT apiTypeId id, apiTypeName name FROM qyfinance.bkvw_api_ApiTypeVendorPartner WHERE vendorId = #{nimeide}
